description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A fighting game... with avatars!  Use your own avatar as a custom fighter with a customizable move set!  Fight to become champion of the Avatar Fighter tournament!
description.short: A fighting game... with avatars!  Use your own avatar as a custom fighter with a customizable move set!  Fight to become champion of the Avatar Fighter tournament!
